name: regrepnsnefpoh
text:
I'm sorry, but I don't understand what's genius. Philippe is always surrounded by porn and alcohol and irresponsible adults, but somehow he turns bad by going for a walk?
Is that the punchline?

text: All I know is that, in retrospect, that neighborhood is fucking awesome.

Ray's nipples and bellybutton look like a face.

Kinda creepy.

name: wolfslice
text: I like how he went out of his way to check out that oil stain

name: someone3
text: that is puke, not an oil stain.

name: wolfslice
text: Good call. I guess I subconsciously tried to make up something "in character" for Philippe (going out of his way to look at a random oil stain) in this otherwise sinfully non-canon guest strip.

name: deusoma
text: I'm pretty sure that in the Family Circus comics this one makes fun of, an oil stain in a driveway is one of the stops Billy once made. So the visual similarity may be on purpose.

name: imitationcrab
text: I was under the impression it was pee!  Could be puke though.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Could be either-- all I'm convinced of is that it is from inside Philippe.

text: Could be both.

text: What is it with guest artists and robbing poor Philipe of his childlike innocence? He is five, people!

text: it couldn't have been a fiver.  it must have been a fiftyer at least.

name: fox
text: He stopped at the video poker place and turned the five into more.  Also, he may or may not have killed someone and taken their money.

name: the_doz
text: Man, the hell Ray ever knows what he pulls out of his dang wallet. It could have been a C-spot, for all we know.

name: wulvaine
text: It was probably a six-hundo. That's Ray's preferred denomination.

name: red_dawn
text: The Onstad household sure is in a bad neighborhood in this strip.

name: myrmidon101
text: It is imperative that Phillipe goes under the murder scene barricade.

text: Philippe has hella sass to get a lot of services that are usually provided to consenting adults, like liquor, nudes, and Lucky Strikes.

text: He walked out of the hotel and right around another damsel.  No refractory period for this intrepid tot!

name: canusdivinus
text: I gotta wonder how Philippe did all that stuff with just a fiver. I mean he kills that one guy (presumably) and maybe got some dough off him, but before that? Philippe has no way of getting money, ever!

name: norrec
text: I was gonna ask how he got all that for five dollars, but then I saw the video poker.

name: speth
text: LIVE NUDE REVUES

name: cbtbone
text: I think "ABC Liquor" appears again later as the liquor store next to Uncle George's Greek restaurant after the GOF.

name: possums
text:
I guess my biggest problem with the guest strips is that half of them try to make Philippe into a douchebag. CAUSE HE SO INNOCENT

it's just kinda stupid

name: tekende
text: I was just about to make a comment like this. It really irritates me too. Why do they all seem to want to corrupt him so much? Is it not enough that the rest of the cast are alcoholics, drug addicts, sociopathic murderers, or depressives? Philippe has to be screwed-up too?
